m_szDocTitle: Light-Duty Automotive Technology, Carbon Dioxide Emissions and Fuel Economy Trends Report 1975 Through 2013
m_szDocSumamry: Light-Duty Automotive Technology, Carbon Dioxide Emissions, and Fuel Economy Trends: 1975 Through 2013         United States         Environmental Protection        k Agency EPA-420-R-13-011 December 2013 -------  NOTICE:  This technical report does not necessarily represent final EPA decisions or positions. It is intended to present technical analysis of issues using data that are currently available.  The purpose in the release of such reports is to facilitate  the exchange of technical information and to inform the public of technical developments. -------  TABLE OF CONTENTS I. Introduction
